title: Blue cheese and onion chutney beef burgers
ingredients: ['Beef burgers', '675g minced beef, preferably 20% fat', '1 teaspoon coarse sea salt', '1/2 teaspoon ground black pepper', '2 teaspoons olive oil', '200g blue cheese of choice, sliced into 4 slabs', '4 tablespoons shop-bought onion chutney', '4 burger buns or ciabatta rolls, halved']
